channel.title: Hi guys spell problem
channel.description:
hi guys ive ADDED the spell for the storm of armadyl on the rod of ivandis when i try to attack monsters via rod of ivandis spell added i get those errors at run.bit and at doesnt attack
[code][23:20 17/11/14]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12951 [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.combat.CombatAssistant.getAttackD elay(CombatAssistant.java:2779) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.combat.CombatAssistant.attackNpc( CombatAssistant.java:112) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.Client.process(Client.java:887) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandl er.java:138) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:159) [23:20 17/11/14]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12951 [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.combat.CombatAssistant.getAttackD elay(CombatAssistant.java:2779) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.combat.CombatAssistant.attackNpc( CombatAssistant.java:112) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.Client.process(Client.java:887) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.game.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandl er.java:138) [23:20 17/11/14]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:159)[/code]
here is my combatass http://pastebin.com/AQqK2jSv
